mapper.select: SELECT count(tut.id) ongoing from t_teammate_re ttr LEFT JOIN t_user_team tut ON tut.id=ttr.user_team_id and tut.status=0 where ttr.stateflag=0 AND ttr.status=1 and (ttr.type=0 or ttr.type=1 ) and ttr.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tut.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT ttr.type,count(*) peopleNum from t_teammate_re ttr LEFT JOIN t_user_team tut ON tut.id=ttr.user_team_id where ttr.status=1 and ttr.stateflag=0 and tut.stateflag=0 and tut.object_id=#{objectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tut.object_type=#{objectType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tut.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY ttr.type

SELECT tci.id,tci.company_name,tci.type,tut.user_type userType from t_company_info tci LEFT JOIN t_user_info tui ON tui.company_id=tci.id LEFT JOIN t_user_tag tut ON tut.user_id=tui.id where tci.id IN ( SELECT tut.company_id from t_user_team tut where tut.object_id=#{objectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and tut.object_type=#{objectType,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY tut.company_id ) GROUP BY tci.id

SELECT tui.id,tui.real_name realName,tui.mobile,tui.user_name userName from t_user_info tui LEFT JOIN t_user_tag tust ON tust.user_id=tui.id WHERE tui.stateflag=0 AND tust.stateflag=0 and tust.role_id=1 and tui.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT tut.object_id,tut.object_type,ttr.user_id,ttr.user_team_id,tut.object_oper_status from t_user_team tut LEFT JOIN t_teammate_re ttr ON ttr.user_team_id=tut.id where tut.stateflag=0 and ttr.status=1 and ttr.id=#{teammateId,jdbcType=INTEGER} LIMIT 0,1
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(lw.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') time from t_follow_up_message lw where lw.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY lw.create_at desc LIMIT 0,1
SELECT bor.business_id from t_business_obj_re bor where bor.object_id=#{objectId} and bor.object_type=#{objectType}
SELECT * from bt_lender where id=#{objectId}
SELECT * from bt_asset where id=#{objectId}

SELECT tui.id userId,tui.mobile,tui.real_name realName,tut.role_id rold, tut.user_type userType,tci.company_name companyName,tci.type companyType, tui.email from t_user_info tui LEFT JOIN t_user_tag tut ON tut.user_id=tui.id LEFT JOIN t_company_info tci ON tci.id=tui.company_id WHERE tui.id=#{userId} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT ttr.user_id,tui.real_name FROM t_user_team tut LEFT JOIN t_teammate_re ttr ON ttr.user_team_id=tut.id LEFT JOIN t_user_info tui ON tui.id=ttr.user_id where tut.object_id=#{objectId} and tut.object_type=#{objectType} and ttr.type=#{type}

SELECT count(*) from t_zcy_estates tze LEFT JOIN t_zcy_owner tzo ON tzo.estates_id=tze.id LEFT JOIN t_zcy_maintain tzm ON tzm.estates_id=tze.id LEFT JOIN t_zcy_key tzk ON tzk.estates_id=tze.id LEFT JOIN t_zcy_express tzex ON tzex.estates_id=tze.id LEFT JOIN t_zcy_estates_address tzea ON tzea.estates_id=tze.id
tze.stateflag=0
SELECT zef.type,zef.name,zef.code from t_zcy_estates_facility zef where zef.estates_id=#{estatesId} and (zef.type=0 or zef.type=1)

SELECT tui.id userId from t_company_team tct LEFT JOIN t_company_team_re ctr ON ctr.company_team_id=tct.id LEFT JOIN t_user_info tui ON ctr.accepter_id=tui.id LEFT JOIN t_user_tag tut ON tut.user_id=tui.id WHERE tct.object_id=#{objectId} AND tct.object_type=#{objectType} AND tut.user_type=#{userType} LIMIT 0,1

SELECT tut.user_type userType from t_company_team tct LEFT JOIN t_company_team_re ttr ON ttr.company_team_id=tct.id LEFT JOIN t_user_tag tut ON tut.user_id=ttr.accepter_id where tct.stateflag=0 AND ttr.stateflag=0 AND ttr.status=1 AND tct.object_id=#{objectId} and tct.object_type=#{objectType}

SELECT tui.real_name realName,tui.avg,tui.mobile,tui.company_id companyId,tut.user_id userId, tut.role_id roleType,tut.user_type userType,tut.occupation,tci.company_name companyName,tui.email from t_user_info tui LEFT JOIN t_user_tag tut ON tut.user_id=tui.id LEFT JOIN t_company_info tci ON tci.id=tui.company_id WHERE tui.id=#{userId}

SELECT tut.id,tut.company_id companyId,tut.manger_id mangerId, ttr.join_type joinType,ttr.type,ttr.user_id userId FROM t_user_team tut LEFT JOIN t_teammate_re ttr ON ttr.user_team_id=tut.id WHERE ((ttr.user_id=#{userId} AND ttr.status=1)OR tut.manger_id=#{userId}) AND tut.stateflag=0 AND tut.object_id=#{objectId} AND tut.object_type=#{objectType} LIMIT 0,1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM bt_source_info WHERE stateflag=0 AND estates_id=#{estatesId}
